description:
This could well be something I'm doing wrong but I got this when trying to run from the Terminal:

$ pa-applet
/snap/pa-applet/3/bin/desktop-launch: line 531: /snap/pa-applet/3/flavor-select: No such file or directory

(process:53753): Gtk-WARNING **: Locale not supported by C library.
	Using the fallback 'C' locale.

(pa-applet:53753): Gtk-WARNING **: GTK+ module /snap/pa-applet/3/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/gtk-2.0/modules/libcanberra-gtk-module.so cannot be loaded.
GTK+ 2.x symbols detected. Using GTK+ 2.x and GTK+ 3 in the same process is not supported.
Gtk-Message: Failed to load module "canberra-gtk-module"

(pa-applet:53753): Gtk-WARNING **: GTK+ module /snap/pa-applet/3/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/gtk-2.0/modules/libcanberra-gtk-module.so cannot be loaded.
GTK+ 2.x symbols detected. Using GTK+ 2.x and GTK+ 3 in the same process is not supported.
Gtk-Message: Failed to load module "canberra-gtk-module"
Fontconfig error: Cannot load default config file
shm_open() failed: Permission denied
Failed to connect to the server, retrying soon
Unable to connect context

(pa-applet:53753): Gtk-CRITICAL **: gtk_main_quit: assertion 'main_loops != NULL' failed
shm_open() failed: Permission denied
Failed to connect to the server, retrying soon
Unable to connect context

(pa-applet:53753): GLib-GObject-WARNING **: invalid cast from 'GtkStatusIcon' to 'GtkWidget'

(pa-applet:53753): Gtk-CRITICAL **: gtk_widget_destroy: assertion 'GTK_IS_WIDGET (widget)' failed
summary: Wouldn't load - no contact details or website to go to for help/info
